Watchman 守望者看电影学英语尽在爱酷英语... ... dawn: 黎明 misquote: 误引 tangle: 缠结.
And as ——2—— transmuted tragedy(悲剧) into morbid(病态的) comedy, a misquote(错误引用) from the movie, “A dingo ate my baby!,” caught on.
徐俪文上午于记者会表示，经与当事人联系了解，他的谈话是被错误引用（misquoted），且那场座谈是不做正式纪录的（off the recor…

list.abs: ...被人错误引用，错误就在于把原文割裂开了。至于锋芒还要狡辩道这是两句话。只要在谷歌下搜索这句话，再打上misquotation（引用错误），就会出现一大片对于这种割裂的纠正。我随便截了其中一个，是维基给的。
misprint 印错；印刷错误misquotation 引用错误；误引的文字misregistration 配准不良

entry.def: If someone is misquoted, something that they have said or written is repeated incorrectly.

example.ex: He claimed that he had been misquoted and he threatened to sue the magazine for libel...
example.tran: 他声称自己的话被错误地引用，并威胁说要以诽谤罪起诉这家杂志。

example.ex: The case was brought by a psychoanalyst who says a journalist misquoted him in a series of magazine articles.
example.tran: 这起官司是由一位心理分析学家起诉的，他声称一名记者发表在杂志上面的一系列文章里错误地引用了他的话。

auth_sentence.content: I'm sure it is unfair to misquote even those you despise.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm sure it is unfair to misquote even those you despise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm sure it is unfair to misquote even those you despise.

auth_sentence.content: But, to misquote Mr Marvin Gaye, it is not clear that "statistical healing is good for me".
auth_sentence.res_content: But, to misquote Mr Marvin Gaye, it is not clear that "statistical healing is good for me".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, to misquote Mr Marvin Gaye, it is not clear that "statistical healing is good for me".

auth_sentence.content: Not only did you misquote, but you failed to use a proper calculation in your math because of it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not only did you misquote, but you failed to use a proper calculation in your math because of it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not only did you misquote, but you failed to use a proper calculation in your math because of it.
